overview: Sweetheart Video proudly presents "Mia Loves Girls" - the latest star showcase in its top selling series. Best new starlet Mia Malkova undulates her way through four heart-stopping, sensual scenes with four beauties of her choice: Whitney Westgate, Kenna James, Bree Daniels and Aubrey Star. Enjoy her candid interviews, and see why this stunner is an enormous favorite amongst fans and co-stars alike!
title: Mia Loves Girls
